productos.nombre: Proquip Dual-Plate Check Valve: Wafer Type
caracteristicas: Retainerless emission-free design. With no holes through the body wall, leakage to the outside is impossible.
Body surface with uninterrupted gasket surface.
Intrinsically fire safe.
The reduced weight of the disc minimizes slamming and water hammer.
The disc side hinges, eliminate the effect of gravity resulting in lower energy costs when installed in a horizontal pipeline.
Design maximizes the flow path area through the valve with a lower pressure drop. The internal retention method does not encroach on the gasket sealing surface.
Springs provide a fast-acting response to flow reversal, minimizing stress and maximizing service life.
Shock bumpers extended cycle life of internal components with minimal wear in severe service.
Extended seat life due to the clearance between the disc hinge and hinge pin which eliminates any dragging effect from the discs.
Velan Proquip dual plate check valves easily meet and exceed test requirements of API 598 for metal-seated check valves.
API 594 Face-to-face dimension
To suit ANSI B16.5 flanges, NPS 2-24 (DN 50-600)
To suit ANSI B16.47 Series A flanges, NPS 26 (DN 650) and larger
ASME B16.47 Series B available upon request.

productos.nombre: Proquip Dual-Plate Check Valve: Hub End Type
productos.descripcion: Velan Proquip hub end dual-plate check valves are made of carbon, stainless, or alloy steel to handle an extensive range of applications. The retainerless body is clamped into a piping system by using clamp connectors per customer’s requirements.
caracteristicas: Retainerless emission-free design. With no holes through the body wall, leakage to the outside is impossible.
Body surface with uninterrupted gasket surface.
Intrinsically fire safe.
The reduced weight of the disc minimizes slamming and water hammer.
The disc side hinges, eliminate the effect of gravity resulting in lower energy costs when installed in a horizontal pipeline.
Design maximizes the flow path area through the valve with a lower pressure drop. The internal retention method does not encroach on the gasket sealing surface.
Springs provide a fast-acting response to flow reversal, minimizing stress and maximizing service life.
Shock bumpers extended cycle life of internal components with minimal wear in severe service.
Extended seat life due to the clearance between the disc hinge and hinge pin which eliminates any dragging effect from the discs.
Velan Proquip dual plate check valves easily meet and exceed test requirements of API 598 for metal-seated check valves.

productos.nombre: Proquip Dual-Plate Check Valve: Double Flange Type
productos.descripcion: Velan Proquip double flange dual-plate check valves are made of cast carbon, stainless, or alloy steel to handle an extensive range of applications. The retainerless body is available in a drilled-thru or threaded double flange ends.
caracteristicas: Retainerless emission-free design. With no holes through the body wall, leakage to the outside is impossible.
Body surface with uninterrupted gasket surface.
Intrinsically fire safe.
The reduced weight of the disc minimizes slamming and water hammer.
The disc side hinges, eliminate the effect of gravity resulting in lower energy costs when installed in a horizontal pipeline.
Design maximizes the flow path area through the valve with a lower pressure drop. The internal retention method does not encroach on the gasket sealing surface.
Springs provide a fast-acting response to flow reversal, minimizing stress and maximizing service life.
Shock bumpers extended cycle life of internal components with minimal wear in severe service.
Extended seat life due to the clearance between the disc hinge and hinge pin which eliminates any dragging effect from the discs.
Velan Proquip dual plate check valves easily meet and exceed test requirements of API 598 for metal-seated check valves.
ASME B16.5 for NPS 12–24 (DN 300–600).
ASME B16.47 Series A for NPS 26 (DN 650) and larger.
ASME B16.47 Series B available upon request.

productos.nombre: Proquip Dual-Plate Check Valve: Butt Weld End Type
productos.descripcion: Velan Proquip butt weld end dual-plate check valves are made of carbon, stainless, or alloy steel to handle an extensive range of applications. The butt weld ends are designed to be directly welded into a piping system.
